desc: 测试简单的查询出差申请本表的案例
name: SelectTravelSelfSimpleWhere
desc: 测试点：不测试复杂查询条件（分组、聚合、子查询），包含指定列、常量列，不含子表字段、相关表中的字段

oqls.name: SelectTravelOne
oqls.oql: select applyId, applyName from Travel where applyId = '434743DSS-FEL3232-323KLFJFDS-323FDSD'
oqls.sql: select APPLY_ID, APPLY_NAME from TRAVEL where APPLY_ID = '434743DSS-FEL3232-323KLFJFDS-323FDSD'

oqls.name: SelectTravelOneVars
oqls.oql: select applyId, applyName from Travel where applyId = #{applyId}
oqls.sql: select APPLY_ID, APPLY_NAME from TRAVEL where APPLY_ID = #{applyId}

oqls.name: SelectTravelListVars
oqls.oql: select applyId, applyName from Travel where applyId = #{applyId}
oqls.sql: select APPLY_ID, APPLY_NAME from TRAVEL where APPLY_ID = #{applyId}

oqls.name: SelectTravelInList
oqls.oql: select applyId, applyName from Travel where applyId in ('434743DSS-FEL3232-323KLFJFDS-323FDSD', '534743DSS-FEL2232-323KLFJFDS-323FDSD')
oqls.sql: select APPLY_ID, APPLY_NAME from TRAVEL where APPLY_ID in ('434743DSS-FEL3232-323KLFJFDS-323FDSD', '534743DSS-FEL2232-323KLFJFDS-323FDSD')

oqls.name: SelectTravelInListVars
oqls.oql: select applyId, applyName from Travel where applyId in (#{applyIds})
oqls.sql: select APPLY_ID, APPLY_NAME from TRAVEL where APPLY_ID in (#{applyIds})
